title: The Night Before the Divorce
overview: Marital comedy with a dash of murder.
tagline: IT'S CUPID'S LAST STAND!

title: Under Age
overview: Fresh out of reform school, a bunch of delinquent girls fall in with a gang of crooks and are put to work as "hostesses" in a number of mob-controlled bars and cafes. The girls are expected to string along male customers so that the latter will squander their money on watered-down drinks and fixed poker games. When one gullible New Yorker is clipped to the tune of $18,000 worth of diamonds, the Law closes in.
tagline: A thrill-packed blast of dramatic dynamite!

title: L'assassin a peur la nuit
overview: Having pulled off a robbery with his friend Maurice, Olivier leaves his mistress Lola and hides out in a small village in the country. He finds work, thanks to a young man named Gilbert, who introduces him to his sister, Monique. Once the robbery has been all but forgotten, Olivier intends to head back to Paris, but before he goes, he steals money from his employer. In Paris, Olivier wants to say a proper goodbye to Lola, but she is being blackmailed by Jérôme, an antique dealer who has recognized a necklace stolen by Olivier. Before returning to Monique, Olivier calls on Jérôme to recover the necklace.

title: Wild Horse Phantom
overview: A lawman stages a prison break so a gang of imprisoned robbers will lead him to their hidden loot.
tagline: Mystery Rider Dares Nest of Killers to Avenge Justice!

title: La mujer sin cabeza
overview: A magician suspected of having killed a colleague is arrested by the police, but his assistant helps him escape.

title: City of Chance
overview: Texas girl goes to New York, becomes a newspaper reporter, and tries to get her gambler boyfriend to come home.
tagline: She wanted thrills --- and she found them in the dangerous hours before dawn!

title: The Mantrap
overview: Henry Stephenson stars as a retired Scotland Yard detective. He is regarded as an icon because he has written volumes of books on the art of detection. While Stephenson is being honoured for his past successes, he senses modern detectives, particularly the current District Attorney, look at him and his methods as outdated. This spurs the old man out of retirement to prove himself to the know-it-all modern detectives.

title: The Case of the Frightened Lady
overview: A classic British thriller set in a sinister old house, based on a story by Edgar Wallace.

title: El muerto falta a la cita
overview: On the night of his marriage a young man runs over a cyclist. He believes he is dead, he hides the body and a mysterious character appears.

title: Scotland Yard
overview: Inspector Cork pursues a bank robber who serves in the army and receives facial injuries. After plastic surgery he shows up as a bank president planning an enormous robbery.
tagline: He stole a banker's face! - and his wife

title: Secret Enemies
overview: FBI agents Carl Becker and John Trent raid a New York hotel, sending Nazi spies to an upstate hunting lodge.
tagline: Beautiful But... BEWARE! She may be one of Uncle Sam's SECRET ENEMIES

title: So You Won't Talk?
overview: A shy book reviewer is confused with a notorious gangster who has just been release from prison.
tagline: THE BROWN BOMBER OF MIRTH IN A LAUGHING KNOCKOUT!

title: Gang Busters
overview: Police detectives battle the League of Murdered Men, a gang of resurrected dead criminals.
tagline: Radio's Greatest Action-Show Exploding on the Screen!

title: Girl in the News
overview: An elderly lady manages to sneak some pills away from her nurse and dies of an overdose. The nurse is tried for murder and acquitted. Some time later the nurse, under a new name and identity, cares for a patient who also dies of an overdose. When her real identity comes out, suspicions arouses.

title: Rise and Shine
overview: The college president, the head cheerleader and a gambling gangster try to keep a flunking football star in the game
tagline: A COLLEGIATE CARNIVAL of ROMANCE, MELODY and MADNESS!

title: Joe Smith, American
overview: Joe Smith is an ordinary American family man who works in an aircraft factory. Shortly after being a promoted to a much higher position, Joe is kidnapped by enemy agents who are determined to get military secrets out of him by any means possible. Will Joe keep quiet or betray his country...
tagline: Thrilling! It Will Lift You to the Skies!

title: Hit the Road
overview: Kids look to get revenge when their fathers are all killed in a mob war.
tagline: ADOPTED...BY A DAME! The gang meets a new boss...and she's truthful, tender...and tough!

title: Forgotten Girls
overview: A disillusioned factory worker is charged with the attempted murder of her mother's lover.

title: Creo en Dios
overview: A 1941 film directed by Fernando de Fuentes.

title: I Take This Oath
overview: The trials and tribulations of a group of newly sworn-in police officers.
tagline: A Romantic and Exciting Melodrama of the Metropolitan

title: Where Are Your Children?
overview: Judy Wilson (Gale Storm), feeling neglected because both of her parents are working in defense plants, meets and falls in love with Danny Chester (Jackie Cooper), who enlists in the Navy and is sent to San Diego for training. She accepts an invitation to go on a ride to San Diego with her friends Herb (Neyle Morrow), Opal (Evelyn Eaton)and Jerry (Jimmy Zahner) but doesn't know the car has been stolen.
tagline: IT'S AN ENTIRE GENERATION RUNNING WILD!

title: Destiny
overview: Framed for two crimes he didn't commit, and betrayed by his girl, Cliff Banks finds himself on the run from the police. Now distrustful of everyone, he finds a safe haven hiding out at a quaint country cottage under the care of a kindly old farmer and his daughter, a Cinderella-like blind woman who seems to be able to communicate with nature. There he is forced by their love to question his misanthropy.

title: They Came by Night
overview: A man is blackmailed into taking his brother's place in a gang for a jewellery heist.

title: Broadway
overview: Gangsters, nightclubs and the Roaring '20s.
tagline: Together for the first time!

title: Deadlock
overview: A murderous twin gets his comeuppance.

title: Framed
overview: A young newspaper reporter finds himself framed for murder.

title: The Falcon Out West
overview: When a Texas playboy is murdered in a New York City nightclub the Falcon investigates. When he learns that the victim was slipped rattlesnake venom, the trail leads to Texas, his own kidnapping and near death.
tagline: Try and pick the killer from this tempting trio!

title: Tall, Dark and Handsome
overview: Robin Hoodish gangster in 1929 Chicago is an object of affection, kind to New York hood and bad to a bad crook.
tagline: What a man...He's a killer that doesn't kill

title: Alibi
overview: In 1930s France a bar hostess helps a man prove himself innocent of murder.
tagline: A Woman's Conscience - the only flaw in this perfect crime!

title: Who Killed Aunt Maggie?
overview: When a much-despised matriarch is murdered, or apparently murdered, all of her relatives and "friends" fall under suspicion. Sheriff Gregory is the official investigator, but most of the clue gathering is done by amateur sleuths Kirk Pierce and Sally Ambler.

title: Danger Ahead
overview: The Royal Mounties are called in when one of the armored cars owned by Maxwell, containing a gold shipment, disappears with driver George Hill suspected of trying to get away with the gold. Actually, Maxwell and two henchmen had poured acid on the brake lines, causing the car to crash. Genevieve, daughter of the Mountie chief, suspects Maxwell and Thomas Hatch, president of the bank shipping the gold, but she quickly becomes more trouble than help to Sergeant Renfrew in charge of the investigation. Renfrew and Constable Kelly drive the next shipment but Maxwell plans to make them crash the same way as Hill did. Renfrew steers the vehicle into a hillside and this gives him an idea of what happened to the other car.

belongs_to_collection.name: Renfrew of the Royal Mounted Collection

tagline: THE REDCOATS ARE COMING!

title: Strange Alibi
overview: An undercover cop finds himself on the wrong side of the law when the mob discovers his true identity.
tagline: The world would not believe his amazing story...and the only man who could prove it true...was dead!

title: Spy Train
overview: People on a train want what's in a Nazi spy bag, unaware it's a time bomb.

title: Ride, Kelly, Ride
overview: A jockey struggles against gamblers with the help of the stable trainer and horse owner's daughter.
tagline: Thrills to Win...Laughs to Play...Romance to Show!

title: The Great Train Robbery
overview: Tom Logan is a railroad detective who takes it upon himself to halt the activities of his crooked brother Duke. Duke and his henchman have stolen an entire gold train, including the passengers......

title: Boston Blackie Goes Hollywood
overview: Blackie receives a call from a friend who asks him to retrieve some money from his apartment and deliver it to him in California. Performing this good deed, he is accused of theft, but is allowed to proceed to Hollywood to help the police find a lost diamond.
tagline: WHAT A MOVING PICTURE...when Blackie moves in on this blonde picture! Hollywood gets a new kind of thrill!

title: Easy Life
overview: In this entry in the MGM "Crime Does Not Pay" series young Frank Davis, dropping out of school and joining a small-time hoodlum gang, finds out that leading a life of crime is not all he thought it would be.

title: Boss of Bullion City
overview: A lawman sets out to disrupt the operations of a crooked town boss.
tagline: HEADIN' INTO A HAIL OF LEAD!

title: Women in Hiding
overview: In this Crime Does Not Pay series short, a young woman wants to save her baby, but is afraid of telling her parents and has no money to pay the hospital costs involved. She falls prey to a baby-for-sale racket with quack doctors performing their services.

title: Mr. District Attorney in the Carter Case
overview: Like the first entry, this one is played mostly for laughs, with Radio's Mister District Attorney. James Ellison replacing Dennis O'Keefe as feckless assistant DA P. Cadwallader Jones. The publisher of a tony fashion magazine is murdered, requiring Jones to sift through a colorful array of suspects. He is helped along by snoopy girl reporter Terry Parker.

title: Derailed
overview: A young woman of good family is driven into one of thieves and prostitutes and ends in suicide.

title: Headline
overview: A crime reporter begins to investigate the disappearance of his bosses wife who had witnessed a murder.
tagline: A suspense-laden tale of crime, intrigue - and a murder that was almost perfect.

title: Black Diamonds
overview: A reporter on a visit to his hometown hears of dangerous conditions at the local coal mine, and proceeds to investigate.
tagline: DISASTER! Doomed to death in a dynamite-loaded mine!

title: Know Your Money
overview: This MGM Crime Does Not Pay series short tells the fictitious story of a bill counterfeiting ring and explores the government's attempt to curb counterfeiting.

title: Sleepy Lagoon
overview: Young radio personality Judy Joyner becomes mayor of the moribund town, Sleepy Lagoon, after running on an all women ticket and promptly sets out to turn the town around.
tagline: Here's everything you desire in the way of fun-filled, laugh-laden musical entertainment...And remember, in addition to Judy, you'll see and hear Dennis Day, singing star of Jack Benny's radio program!

title: Rabab
overview: As Rabab escapes from the cruelty of his stepmother and stays with an actress, she meets the young man, Ihsan, who tries to assault her inside his car, which overturns and dies. With his father’s attempt to take revenge on Rabab, she decides to flee again to Cairo to work as a teacher there under the name (Najwa). Then she met a colleague of hers and married him.

title: The Briggs Family
overview: During the Second World War, a special constable and former solicitor is called upon to defend his son who is accused of the theft of a car

title: The Case of the Screaming Bishop
overview: Hairlock Combs, a parody of Sherlock Holmes, and his partner Dr. Gotsome bumble through an investigation of a stolen dinosaur skeleton.

title: Kuollut mies vihastuu
overview: Rainer Sarmo and Mikko Vehmer stumble upon a Russian counterfeit league. They help Leila Varta, who tries to save her brother Raimo from the evil Josef Hakim. The beautiful pianist Maria Lichter is puzzled by the events.

title: Law and Disorder
overview: On the eve of WWII a young defence lawyer, assisted by his wife, invaigles his way into a gang of foreign saboteurs. Comedy thriller, ably executed by a satisfactory cast.

title: I'll Sell My Life
overview: A woman hoping to raise cash to pay for an operation to restore her blind brother's eyesight finds herself implicated in a nightclub murder.

title: Varjoja Kannaksella
overview: Lieutenant Ville Somero investigates a sabotage at a fortress site on the Karelian Isthmus in the summer of 1939. His suspicions are directed at the guests of a nearby guesthouse. Aarno Teräs an engineer leading the fortification site, and his bride Birgit Lahti get into trouble because of a band of spies and dancer Veronica Sorrento.

title: The Deadly Game
overview: A pre-World War II saber-rattler that finds a munitions inventor kidnapped, a federal agent killed and a beautiful refugee mysteriously missing as Washington's deadly game of espionage and intrigue thunders on...as the FBI hunts the nation's invisble foes! They may have been invisible but their accents and billing names von Morhart, William Vaughn (William von Brincken already hiding under another name before hostilities were formally declared), Frederick Gierman and Walter Bonn---provide clues aplenty as to their country of origin and paymaster.
tagline: BEAUTIFUL REFUGEE MYSTERIOUSLY MISSING!

title: Madame et le mort
overview: A person who had usurped the identity of a famous writer of detective stories was killed in the train. Why and by whom?

title: Devil's Harvest
overview: An investigator goes after the people who are corrupting the nation's youth by spreading the weed of Satan--MARIJUANA!!!
tagline: A good girl until she lights a "reefer"

title: Secrets of the Underground
overview: With the help of a WAAC group, Mr. District Attorny smashes a Nazi spy-ring that is selling counterfeit War Stamps and Bonds.
tagline: DESPERATE KILLER!..ADDING NEW MURDERS TO COVER THE LAST..SINKING LOWER AND LOWER INTO THE SECRETS OF THE Underground

title: Riot Squad
overview: Crime drama starring Richard Cromwell as a young medic who becomes the private physician to an underworld gang.

title: Patrolling the Ether
overview: 1940. Sixteen year old Phillip is one of a number of amateur radio operators across the US, doing it purely as a fun hobby. He is informed by Bill Beck of the Radio and Intelligence Division (RID) of the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) that amateur international radio communication is now banned due to spying a result of the war in Europe. Beck, on behalf of the RID, asks Phillip, however, to continue to monitor the airwaves for suspicious activity.

title: Behind Prison Walls
overview: A reworking of a familiar theme, the story finds scheming steel tycoon James J. MacGlennon (Tully Marshall) and his high-minded lawyer son Jonathan (Alan Baxter) simultaneously ending up behind bars. While incarcerated, Jonathan tries to mend his larcenous father's ways, thereby drawing closer to his not-so-bad dad.

title: Man From Headquarters
overview: A police reporter solves a murder case in Chicago, then moves on to St. Louis-but not voluntarily, since he has been kidnapped by the minions of the Windy City gang leader against whom he is scheduled to testify.
tagline: "THEY DON'T DARE KILL A REPORTER!" It's easy for an editor to say that, but he knows if he puts the finger on an underworld czar, he is a dead man!

title: Ungdom i bojor
overview: A waitress finds out that her fourteen year old brother is a member of a youth gang doing burglaries in kiosks. Valdemar Jansson escapes prison and seeks out his fiancee Karin, but she does not want to know about him. She studies at the Social Institute and provides herself as a waitress in a cafe. She lives with her grandmother and her younger brother Benke. One day she discovers that Benke belongs to a boy, who makes minor burglaries in newspaper kiosks.

title: The Secret Seven
overview: Scientists assembled to prove their methods are effective in criminal investigation try to solve a series of murders.
tagline: UNEARTHING CLUES NO HUMAN EYE COULD DETECT.. TO DESTROY KILLERS NO BULLETS COULD STOP!

title: Whistling in Dixie
overview: Radio sleuth Wally 'The Fox' Benton travels to Georgia with his fiancé Carol to be married; and to help Carol's college chum, Ellamae Downs, solve a mystery involving a murdered man, old Fort Dixon, and buried treasure.
tagline: FUNNIEST FILM EVER MADE !

title: Ghost Catchers
overview: Two zanies get mixed up with a Southern colonel, his beautiful daughters, a nightclub and a haunted mansion.

belongs_to_collection.name: The Olsen & Johnson in Hollywood Collection

tagline: Just Between Us GHOULS...It's SCARE-OOUIE!

title: Keep 'Em Slugging
overview: A gang of tough street kids decide to go straight and get jobs in order to free draft-age men for the war effort. However, because of their past tangles with the law, they can't find anybody who'll hire them. Finally one of them gets a job at the department store where his sister works, but runs afoul of a store executive who is in league with a ring of hijackers.
tagline: THE DEAD END KIDS think their way out of trouble!

title: Livet på en pinne
overview: Aldor Johnsson is an old but unsuccessful criminal.

title: El espectro de la novia
overview: British-born David T. Bamberg was a magician who went by the stage name of Fu Manchu. He was so popular in Mexico and South America that he was given the opportunity to star in a series of crime / horror / mystery films between 1943 and 1949. This is one of them.

title: The Officer and the Lady
overview: A woman who refuses to become involved with a dedicated police officer unknowingly dates a man who is in cahoots with a criminal mastermind.
tagline: Stick with him and you'll end up in the Poor House!

title: Tough as They Come
overview: The 'Dead End Kids & Little Tough Guys' are working as collectors for a finance company, when they discover the company's illegal activities and try to stop them.
tagline: The Gang Takes Over the Law

title: Unholy Partners
overview: A crusading newsman starts up a tabloid with a gangster as his 50-50 partner.
tagline: Mad Manhattan in the Sin Decade

title: Nat-ekspressen (P. 903)
overview: One night there is a terrible accident in the little station town of Bredsted. The young son of the rich Mogens Kragfelt is struck by the Natekspressen (P. 903) near the station. Police chief Aagesen sends the young detective officer Lund (Jørn Jeppesen) to investigate the case, where there are various mysterious circumstances, among other things there are traces of fights at the rails just where Kragfelt was crossed.

title: Frisco Lil
overview: Lil becomes a dealer in a gambling casino in order to get the information she needs to clear her father of a murder charge. She also falls in love with lawyer Brewster.

title: Delinquent Daughters
overview: A town is shocked when a high school girl commits suicide. A reporter and a cop team up to investigate and find out exactly what is going on among the youth of the town.
tagline: CROOKED MONEY! FUN-CRAZED YOUTH! Consorting with Crooks for Money to Spend on Girls, Gin and Gambling!

title: Federal Fugitives
overview: A government agent goes undercover in order to apprehend a saboteur who caused a plane crash.
tagline: A GIRL...A SPY...AND A FEARLESS F. B. I. AGENT in a bombshell of ACTION...INTRIGUE...ROMANCE!

title: Mug Town
overview: Steve Bell, Tommy, Pig, Ape, and String are run of town.  Steve, while hopping a freight card and trying to avoid the brakeman, is killed.  The boys meet Steve's mother, Alice Bell and Tommy is given a job in the storage garage which she owns jointly with Mack Steward.  Steve's brother Don Bell is working with some gangsters by tipping them off on valuable merchandise that can be hijacked.  Pig, Ape and String overhear Don's plans to use Tommy as the fall guy in the next hijacking.
tagline: IT THRILLS!  IT SOCKS!  IT'S SWELL!

title: Un muchacho de Buenos Aires
overview: A singer is employed in a boite to find the murderer of his mother.

title: Holt of the Secret Service
overview: A murderous gang of counterfeiters has kidnapped the government's best engraver and is forcing him to print virtually undetectable phony money. The Secret Service's toughest agent, Jack Holt, and a female reporter go after the gang.
tagline: The Hero Of 10,000 Adventures Tops 'Em All In His First Serial!

title: Soak the Old
overview: Part of MGM's "Crime Does Not Pay" series, this short film focuses on crimes revolving around pension scams.

title: Front Line Kids
overview: Two teenage gang members are forced to be page boys at a hotel where a criminal gang are operating.

title: So's Your Aunt Emma!
overview: A dizzy old spinster gets involved in the boxing racket and gangland murders.
tagline: Every day is April Fool's Day when the guys and dolls of gangland mistake Aunt Emma for a gun moll from Missouri!

title: For the Common Defense!
overview: This Crime Does Not Pay short shows how cooperation among all the nations of the Americas helps the war effort. In this case, a US government agent travels to Chile and Colombia. He works with local authorities to try to thwart an Axis plan to ship stolen ammunition.
tagline: Another Crime Does Not Pay Subject

title: Il cappello da prete
overview: The baron of Santafusca, descended from a noble family, leads a dissipated life. To pay debts he is forced to sell his house. He tries to steal from the house of a very rich priest and, surprised during the theft, he kills the priest, and then throws the body in an abandoned well. He continues his life of revelries and luxury, until the remorse for the crime trigger a process of self-destruction. The nightmares of the baron, tormented by the only evidence left of the murder, the hat of the priest ,drags him into a daring and hallucinated series of ups and downs to the brink of insanity and jail.

title: Besættelse
overview: Den midaldrende manufakturhandler Jens Steen er på vej til sit sommerhus ved Vestkysten for at slappe af. Helt alene. Imens er 20-årige Else Petersen på spanden - og hun vejrer en ferie med alt betalt. Med klassisk kvindelist fedter hun sig ind hos Jens Steen, der bliver besat af hendes skønhed og ungdom. Men da den lokale, jyske cykelmekaniker skruer op for charmen, kommer der kurrer på tråden. Og inden længe har Jens Steen en skandale på hånden, som han kun kan gøre ét for at afvige Selveste Bodil Ipsen instruerede i 1944 et af den danske filmhistories få film-noir dramaer. Besættelse er en fremragende film om følelsernes yderpunkter og tilværelsens ulidelige lethed.

title: Dead Man's Shoes
overview: An amnesia victim is a well liked and respected member of his community--until one day someone from his past shows up with evidence that in "the old days" he had been a notorious criminal, and threatens to expose him unless he pays off.

title: Four Shall Die
overview: Helen Fielding, heir to the fortunes of the late millionaire Roger Fielding, Sr., has broken off her relationship with the unscrupulous Lew Covey to pursue a romance with reporter Bill Summers. Covey, determined to get at Helen's inheritance, vows to win her back.

title: Shantytown
overview: Liz lives with her mother and stepfather in a boarding house on the "wrong side of the tracks"
tagline: MARY LEE IN HER MOST BRILLANT HIT! A Thrill You'll Never Forget As This Heart-Warming Real Life Drama Stirringly Infold On The Screen!

title: Keep 'Em Sailing
overview: An FBI agent goes undercover to investigate the sabotage of American cargo ships.

title: Mr. Dynamite
overview: A ball player takes his girlfriend to a carnival, only to discover a ring of saboteurs.
tagline: DRAMATIC Dynamite!

title: Lucky Legs
overview: Chorus girl Gloria Carroll inherits one million dollars from Broadway playboy Herbert Dinwiddle. Producer Ned McLane persuades her to advance him the money on a production called "Lucky Legs" that will star her. Unfortunately, the money has "made the rounds" prior to reaching Gloria and several less-than-scrupulous characters set out to separate Gloria from her inheritance.
tagline: DANCING, PRANCING, ENTRANCING ROMANCING!

title: The Racket Man
overview: A gangster is drafted into the Army and, soon realizing how wrong his life of crime has been, agrees to help the FBI break up a black market ring by pretending to have been kicked out of service and to have resumed his old life of crime.
tagline: He knew every angle... except a girl's love!

title: Murder with Music
overview: Night club singer Nelle Hill has many suitors an escaped convict, a piano player and a newspaper man. One is killed.  With musical shorts such as “Murder in Swingtime,” “Black and Tan Fantasy,” “Symphony in Black,” and “Ain’t Misbehaving.”

title: Hurricane Smith
overview: Rodeo rider Hurricane Smith is wrongly convicted of murder and robbery, but escapes and creates a new life, but one of the real criminals shows up to claim the loot which he believes Smith has.
tagline: A CYCLONE of ACTION and ROMANCE!
